result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Justin Lee Reynolds

records.addlTxt:
10:08 AM Defendant Justin Lee Reynolds in court.  Attorney Stephen Robert Zuber in court for Justin Lee Reynolds.  Attorney Mark Adam Fruehauf in court for State of Wisconsin. State notes request for another status. Attorney Zuber is in agreement.
Status conference scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 09:00 am.

9:09 AM Defendant Justin Lee Reynolds in court, in custody.  Attorney Stephen Robert Zuber in court for Justin Lee Reynolds.  Attorney Mark Adam Fruehauf in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Zuber received information, waives reading and pleads not guilty. Court accepts not guilty plea. Court sets status conference.
Status conference scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 09:00 am.
State's Demand for Discovery and Inspection.pdf
records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Prosecutor

records.addlTxt:
8:15 AM Prosecuting attorney Mark Adam Fruehauf in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Justin Lee Reynolds in court, in custody.  Attorney Stephen Robert Zuber in court for Justin Lee Reynolds. 
Att Zuber- client will waive prelim
Court finds he has waived prelim, finds probable cause, binds him over for arraignment. Sets date. 
Att  Zuber- requests bail be reduced to signature bond, Makes argument. 
State- Was not given any notice of bail hearing today, no victim notice. Argues against reduction to signature bond. 
Court denies request. Bond and conditions to continue
Arraignment scheduled for June 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Letter to Commissioner - Retained, Remove STC Hearing
Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection
records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Defendant's Motion for Discovery and Inspection

Adjustment Number: 22A 107810,
Payable Number: 148379,
Receipt Number: 22R 006647,
Amount: $20.00
No contact with Victim 1. No intentional contact with minors.

1:40 PM Defendant Justin Lee Reynolds appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Chad LaLor in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case. Verifies address for no contact. Address verified as 721 Clough Avenue, victim does not live there. Court recites charges against defendant and possible penalties. Defendant advised of right to consult an attorney. Defendant indicates he has Attorney Zuber. 
State requests $20,000 cash, no contact with Victim 1 or minors. Prior ties in PA and MN. Cites prior convictions in PA and MN. 
Defendant has no response.
Court orders $20,000 cash, with conditions of no contact with Victim and no intentional contact with minors.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 11, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Status conference scheduled for May 10, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
